Voice acting in English and Spanish.		
	
# Accessibility

- Colorblind-friendly design with texture-based coding system.

- Full one-handed play (controllers/hand tracking).

- Comfort settings for seated play.

**Your opinion matters!** If you have suggestions or feedback, feel free to reach out on Discord:
https://discord.pamp.es/

Thank you for being part of **Sortik Systems’** evolution.

– Alex Pamp

Voice acting in English and Spanish.		
	
# Accessibility

- Colorblind-friendly design with texture-based coding system.

- Full one-handed play (controllers/hand tracking).

- Comfort settings for seated play.

**Your opinion matters!** If you have suggestions or feedback, feel free to reach out on Discord:
https://discord.pamp.es/

Thank you for being part of **Sortik Systems’** evolution.

– Alex Pamp
